name: FPS Waver Project - WIP
description:
Small project, testing monster wave's mechanic. The project is dev by one person, so keep in mind that it is really a beta.

Don't hesitate to share your thoughts :)

Story:

Actually none as of today, maybe later on I'll create something around that massacre.

CONTROLS:

Like many fps:

  • W A S D to move
  • Left Shift to sprint
  • Left Mous Button to shoot
  • R to reload
  • Scroll Wheel to change weapon 
  • Green boxes give you ammo ! They also respawn after a short period of time
  • To navigate through the shop, use the numericals key above your letters

CREDITS:
